data.actual_result: You need to click twice to select an option (1click for focus on Discord, 1 click to actually select)
data.expected_result: You should be able to select a menu option in 1 click
data.short_description: Right clicking on Discord when Discord is not in focus makes the contextmenu unclickable
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on an other app - Right click in Discord - Contextmenu pops up
